0100100110000101 0000111010101111 0 -> sum: 0101100000110100, cout: 0

1110110101010100 0000001111010001 1 -> sum: 1111000100100110, cout: 0
0001111111101101 1010101101100011 1 -> sum: 1100101101010001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
